abstract: Microsoft is close to acquiring Tellme Networks, a privately held maker of products that bridge the worlds of speech recognition and the Internet, in a deal that could come as early as this week, according to CNet News.com.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is close to acquiring Tellme Networks, a privately held maker of products that bridge the worlds of speech recognition and the Internet, in a deal that could come as early as this week, according to CNet News.com.

headline.main: Microsoft in Deal to Buy Tellme, Report Says
